channel.title: Username Change?
channel.description: Hey staff, is it possible to have the X removed from the end of my name? thank you :D

item.title: Username Change?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:5, topic:419566”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=522112.msg3795808#msg3795808 date=1319600112]
Barely get name changes… I know rash got his R capped… Coonhunter has been wanting the Rac in front of his name for a long time now to stop getting attacked by people who think his name means black hunter, but never got it :o

And me, I’m fine with my name, could care less if the first letter is capped or not
[/quote]
<3

Exactly, as this says. The only time you may even be considered for a name change is legit reasons. Like adding ‘Rac’ infront of my name to remove racial remarks. Still hasn’t happened. The only time I think name changes happen are for staff or GOOD friends of staff.[/quote]
<3

Ouch, I had a feeling that name would be taken, just look in the memberslist to see if there is a name you want, confirm with mods and… yeah.
Besides, you don’t have too much post count, registered a few months ago, and can’t have that much time logged in… and rep doesn’t matter… soo… yeah.

Read full topic

item.title: Username Change?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:4, topic:419566”][quote author=Rodgerwilco link=topic=522112.msg3795810#msg3795810 date=1319600215]
Create a new account.
[/quote]
But you would have to tell mods, so they can ban the old account, multi accs is against the rules[/quote]No, we’d just ban both unless we’re in a REALLY good mood.

Read full topic

item.title: Username Change?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:3, topic:419566”]Barely get name changes… I know rash got his R capped… Coonhunter has been wanting the Rac in front of his name for a long time now to stop getting attacked by people who think his name means black hunter, but never got it :o

And me, I’m fine with my name, could care less if the first letter is capped or not[/quote]
<3

Exactly, as this says. The only time you may even be considered for a name change is legit reasons. Like adding ‘Rac’ infront of my name to remove racial remarks. Still hasn’t happened. The only time I think name changes happen are for staff or GOOD friends of staff.
